welcome.title: Welcome to Metropolitan!

order_out_for_delivery.title: Out for Delivery
order_out_for_delivery.body: Your order will be delivered today.

order_delivered.title: Order Delivered
order_delivered.body: Your order has been successfully delivered. Enjoy!

order_refunded.title: Order Refunded
order_refunded.body: Payment refund has been processed for your order.

payment_success.title: Payment Successful
payment_success.body: Your payment has been successfully received.

payment_failed.body: An error occurred while processing your payment.

payment_cancelled.body: Payment for your order has been cancelled.
